questions.question: According to the theory of atoms which of the statements describes the location of electrons?

choices.answer: in the nucleus of the atom
both in the nucleus and around it
outside the nucleus in the surrounding electron cloud
on the outer edge of the nucleus

questions.question: During a thunderstorm you see lightning before you hear thunder. Which explains this?

choices.answer: Light travels faster than sound
Light has a greater mass than sound
Sound has longer wavelengths than light
Sound and light travel at the same speed

questions.question: Jaclyn’s coffee was too hot so she put it in the freezer for 10 minutes. Why did she do that?

choices.answer: adding cold to the coffee would lower its temperature
adding heat from the freezer would lower its temperature
removing heat from the coffee would lower its temperature

questions.question: Sandra brews tea & adds ice to the pitcher. In which direction is the thermal energy flowing?

choices.answer: From the pitcher to the tea
From the tea to the ice
From the ice to the air
From the ice to the tea

questions.question: In which situation would a person show an increase in weight but not an increase in mass?

choices.answer: Climbing to the top of a mountain.
Traveling underwater in a submarine.
Landing on a planet with more gravity.
Living on the international space station.

questions.question: Which of the following physical properties of water did Thomas measure?

choices.answer: melting point and boiling point
volume and thermal conductivity
solubility and electrical conductivity
density and physical states of matter

questions.question: From the table below, which substance has the smallest density?    Density = Mass /Volume

choices.answer: Iron
Gold
Silver
Aluminum

questions.question: Sodium chloride (table salt) was completely dissolved in water. What is the resulting material?

choices.answer: pure substance
salt suspension.
homogeneous mixture
heterogeneous mixture.

questions.question: Using the table, which is a reasonable conclusion regarding elements & the compounds they form?

choices.answer: its physical properties not are changed
its atoms can only combine in one way
only its chemical properties are changed
its atoms combine in a multitude of ways

questions.question: What is the relationship between frequency and wavelength for electromagnetic waves?

choices.answer: Frequency equals wavelength.
As frequency increases, wavelength increases.
As frequency increases, wavelength decreases.
The relationship depends on the speed of the wave.

questions.question: Which graph could represent a car that is traveling at a constant speed?

choices.answer: A
B
C
D

questions.question: At which time interval is the speed zero?
How should Kristin answer the questions?
Which of the foods in the table would the magazine editor recommend that you have more of?

choices.answer: Yogurt
Sour Cream
Fresh Cow Milk
Almond Soy Milk

questions.question: When is the potential energy of the ball being transformed into kinetic energy?

choices.answer: Itis not being transformed at any time
The  entire time the ball is rolling from positions 1 to 5
Only when the ball rolls from position 1 to position 3
Only when the ball rolls from position 3 to position 5

questions.question: Which of the following conditions would cause the model airplane to descend toward the ground?

choices.answer: The lift is equal to the drag.
The lift is less than the weight.
The thrust is equal to the weight.
The thrust is greater than the drag.

questions.question: What is the best explanation for the increase in the speed of the ball?

choices.answer: Electric forces are acting on the ball.
Air resistance is accelerating the ball.
Magnetic forces are pushing the ball.
Gravitational force is pulling on the ball.

questions.question: Read the question carefully below.

choices.answer: Cooling the cake layers.
Mixing the ingredients.
Preheating the oven to 175 °C
Baking the cake batter.

questions.question: Read the question carefully below.

choices.answer: Reflection
Refraction
Absorption
Absorption and reflection

questions.question: Read the question carefully below.

choices.answer: Heat was released from the ice cube into the air
Cold was transferred to Pedro’s hand from the ice
Heat was transferred from Pedro’s hand to the ice
Heat was released from Pedro’s hand into the air

questions.question: Read the question carefully below.

choices.answer: It converted into light energy
It gets converted into chemical energy
It gets converted into mechanical energy
It gets converted into sound and thermal energy

questions.question: Read the question carefully below.

choices.answer: The thickness of the ice
The temperature of the air above the ice
The force of friction between the ice and the rock
The gravitational force between the ice and the rock

questions.question: Read the question carefully below.

choices.answer: The moon has less mass than Earth.
The moon has less mass than the sun.
The moon is closer to Earth than the sun.
The moon is not as hot as the sun.

questions.question: Which of the following has no energy?

choices.answer: A wrecking ball
A pot of Water
a moving vehicle
none of the answer choices

questions.question: Explain the kinetic energy of the vehicles if they are all traveling at the same speed.

choices.answer: The motorcycle has the most kinetic energy
All of the vehicles have the same kinetic energy
The delivery van has the greatest kinetic energy
The pick up truck has the least kinetic energy
